summary: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.
cast: Heather Donahue|Joshua Leonard|Michael C. Williams|Bob Griffin|Jim King|Sandra Sánchez|Ed Swanson|Patricia DeCou|Mark Mason|Susie Gooch
keywords: found footage|lost in the woods|supernatural horror|ghost story|maryland
director: Directors: Daniel Myrick, Eduardo Sánchez (as Eduardo Sanchez)
title: El proyecto de la bruja de Blair
